blog.description: Blog about my life, random but wonderful. Major Depressive Disorder. Wit is my coping mechanism.

summary: It’s Mental Health Day
body:
It’s Mental Health Day

I’m urging anyone who feels they may be alone, or is struggling with mental illness by themselves, to reach out. You are not alone. Mental Illness may make you think you are alone at the time but you aren’t, it is designed to trip you up. Find a support system, keep those poeple close and let them know all your illnesses and be upfront with them about it. Don’t be afraid to tell them you can’t hangout today because today is a bad depression day, or you can’t go outside today because you’re too anxious. If they’re good people they will understand and work with you. Those who choose not to understand mental illness are ignorant and selfish people. They’re also incredibly weak because we go through something so hard everyday that no one can see. It’s hard but again… you’re not alone. Try and stay present, love and welcome the little moments because to me those mean so much more. Find things to do that you love, I call that self care shit, and take care of yourself. Your mind is a temple just as much as your body is and if you don’t protect them or guard them then it will be harder to work toward anything. Keep your head up and reach out to others whom you think are struggling. Mental illness is no joke homies but if you’ve got a good support group, a positive mindset, and a fighting spirit you can make it through it.

Much love today mental illness warriors. <3

Today is #WorldMentalHealthDay. 💚 There can be no #health without...
caption:
#Repost @mentalhealthamerica with @get_repost
・・・
Today is #WorldMentalHealthDay. 💚 There can be no #health without #mentalhealth. ⠀
⠀
➡️300 million people of all ages have #depression⠀
➡️60 million people worldwide are affected by #bipolar⠀
➡️ 23 million people worldwide have #schizophrenia⠀
⠀
Depression is the leading cause of disability, and is a major contributor to the overall global burden of disease. Cost-effective public health and intersectoral strategies and interventions can to promote mental health and recovery before crisis occurs - #b4stage4.

summary: The use of antibiotics in agriculture could have "devastating" consequences for humans, according to a research team at HSBC....
caption: The use of antibiotics in agriculture could have “devastating” consequences for humans, according to a research team at HSBC. Experts predict that antibiotic resistance could lead to 10 million deaths annually by 2050.

summary: The Truth About The Ketogenic Diet
title: The Truth About The Ketogenic Diet
body:
Ketogenic diet what? Here’s every little thing you need to find out about the diet plan that virtually every fit individual is trying and also the best ways to do it right.

Full body changes are rather popular now, and also the health and fitness industry is booming as well as making bigger revenues than ever before before.

These funds are being utilized to support research. One kind of diet that has actually ended up being one of the most researched and followed is the ketogenic diet.

The best supplements also base their active ingredients off of this diet to try and market a product that boosts the oncoming effects from ketosis. 

But, there are still concerns concerning it. Will the ketogenic diet regimen genuinely help you boost lean muscle mass growth?

Is it just a craze diet that will leave us in the near future?

Let’s have a look at the facts surrounding the ketogenic diet.

What Is The Ketogenic Diet?

The ketogenic diet plan is a scientific term utilized to indicate a really low carb diet. You’ll need good knowledge of how your body reacts to particular changes. A shift in your metabolic rate for power manufacturing is a very large offer. People are constantly searching for how to speed up your metabolism. 

The ketogenic diet basically means you consume less carbs compared to normal. For the majority of individuals, this triggers a metabolic switch to naturally happen within one to 7 days.

A metabolic button is when you alter the way your body uses nutrients to produce energy. Energy for many people is gained through glycogen.

This is the stored kind of sugar located throughout your liver, muscular tissues as well as body fat. Glucose is sugar that comes from carbs received in the foods you eat. There are many ways how to measure body fat. 

Since a ketogenic diet restricts the amount of carbohydrates being taken in, your body goes into a metabolic button from utilizing carbohydrates for power to fats instead. When fats are being utilized for energy manufacturing they remain in the kind of acids called ketones.

This is the reason that it is referred to as the ketogenic diet.

This Is The Purpose Of The Ketogenic Diet

Why would put on your own via such a diet? The primary reason this sort of diet began being used was for overweight patients. People who commonly deal with excessive weight usually have an addiction to carbs. This dependency suggests a whole lot of sugar is being consumed. Your body utilizes carbohydrates swiftly for energy to do day-to-day or training based tasks. The problem with this is that your body just requires sufficient to remain active.

Excess carbs end up being stored as harmful body fat.

Limiting the quantity of carbs creates these obese people to no more shop carbohydrates. Instead, they start to utilize their very own body fat to provide power. This drastically causes weight-loss within the very first 2 or three months. But, most of the weight being lost is water weight as carbs are water dense. True weight loss begins hereafter timeframe.

The main reason a great deal of people do the ketogenic diet plan now is how to gain muscle mass but stay lean through the decrease of body fat. The common person following this diet is not overweight, yet does have some excess body fat.

A lot of bodybuilders love this diet regimen for temporary use. It assists them to decrease body fat web content quickly for competition purposes.

Following The Ketogenic Diet plan Usually Ends In Failure

In the right-hand men, this diet regimen has lots of potential advantages. Sadly, the ordinary person adhering to a ketogenic diet regimen will certainly fall short. The major factor is due to the fact that culture has expanded to enjoy carbs.

The biggest section for most dishes is carbohydrates rather of protein. As well as, the kinds of foods we often crave feature carbs. In completion, many people shed their self-control and offer right into their cravings for sugar to make use of as power. This truly is an addiction.

Studies show that the short-term advantages of the ketogenic diet remain in fact lean muscle development and weight loss. That’s when you adhere to the diet regimen together with an appropriate training program.

But, the majority of the team researched returned back to a high carbohydrate consumption after 6 to 8 months of really reduced carbohydrate weight loss.

The just diet that has been confirmed effective past the six-month duration is the Mediterranean diet. The benefits of this diet plan include prevention against cardiovascular disease as well as various other heart associated conditions.

So What Does This Mean For You and also The Ketogenic Diet?

You need lots of willpower as well as the capacity to diet plan with proper food sources to stay healthy. You also need to set short term objectives that concentrate on around one to 6 months of ketogenic dieting.

Some individuals hold true designs for the ketogenic diet plan being used for longer durations.

They have not a problem with it. Sadly, they make up a tiny percent. Consider it like those who smoke and live healthy and balanced lives past the age of 90. It can be done.

But, many cigarette smokers will certainly establish wellness concerns long prior to they reach this age.

There Are Possible Adverse Negative effects to The Ketogenic Diet …

All extreme diet regimens have some feasible side effects to be aware of. The ketogenic diet is no different. Other diet regimens such as a low healthy protein or low-fat calorie limitation take a bit longer to reveal their side effects.

If you get on the ketogenic diet plan, any kind of possible side results will start to reveal much quicker.

Some state the ketogenic diet regimen adverse effects generally begin within a week. In fact, it could be sooner. Some notification it around the 3 or four-day mark.

What Are The Many Typical Negative effects of an Extremely Reduced Carbohydrate Diet?

They include tiredness, power loss, regular headaches, dehydration, loss of psychological focus as well as possible muscle loss.

How long can these adverse effects last?

It depends upon the person complying with the diet regimen. As discussed, a tiny number of individuals will have the ability to undergo exactly what is recognized as a keto-adaptation. This is when your body is capable of using ketones for energy manufacturing, and the negative effects never ever happen.

There is a true display of self-discipline when it pertains to combating past these adverse effects.

This is why most just comply with a severe diet regimen of this nature for brief durations to reduce fat and also permit lean muscle development. Most do not intend to adopt this kind of dieting as a lifestyle choice.

Regarding how to get lean, the science isn’t clear. Some studies reveal the muscles will undergo assimilation, which is when a molecule is exchanged energy.

The absence of carbs to be used for power creates your body to not only utilize ketones, but muscles as well.

Other research studies mention that lean muscle mass will be kept if the person consumes adequate protein as well as nutritional fats. Either way you are taking threats with your body when it pertains to following a ketogenic diet plan for a lengthy time.

This Is Ways to Appropriately Allow Ketosis

Still seeking to obtain the most effective feasible take advantage of a ketogenic diet regimen?

The procedure is not hard to finish regarding beginning the metabolic switch. But, you do have to have a restrictive diet regimen plan that concentrates on nutrients with treatment. The way you consume nutrients may differ depending on how intense you desire the ketosis impact to be.

Some people eat up to 200 calories of carbohydrates every day to attempt to offset the fatigue as well as other side effects. Others totally strip their diet of all carbs. People say that this could create ultimate fatality.

But the Food and also Nourishment Board of the Institute of Medicine says otherwise. They mentioned that no carbohydrates are had to sustain life.

Keep in mind that carbohydrates have actually never ever been recognized as being crucial. In various other words, no person has actually said you require carbohydrates to live. Generally the claims are that a ketogenic diet regimen is entirely alright to follow as a way of living selection. There are no easy diets.

But, the concern most would certainly have is that they will certainly have to discover more food sources that have the vitamins as well as minerals as well as fiber being lost by not eating carbs.

Multi-vitamins are a great means to perhaps stop nutrient shortages. Protein abundant foods usually have dietary fats as well. In various other words, consuming a great deal of foods high in protein will keep most of your diet regimen filled up.

You desire ones that have no cholesterol or trans fat. Keep in mind additionally that fruits as well as veggies are carbs, so if you remove all carbohydrates you are not able to consume these.

Your fridge should be loaded with high healthy protein foods such as poultry, turkey, fish, pork as well as beef. Tofu is a healthy choice as well. Research shows that saturated fats could not exactly be the wrongdoer triggering heart illness as well as high cholesterol on its very own. The research study showed that saturated fats only caused greater cholesterol levels when mixed with high levels of carbohydrates.

But eaten by itself without any carbs it showed no changes. More research study will certainly come to see why this happens.

This Is The Intermittent Ketogenic Diet

This is an advanced variation because you are eating carbs for details changes in your anabolic levels. You allow this to naturally happen by following exactly what is called rip off days. A rip off day implies you can pack your body up with carbohydrates only on that details day. You might do this once a week or when every various other week.

Research shows that rip off days are effective for permitting a lot more weight loss to take place as well as activating muscle-building hormones. The factor behind this theory is that your metabolic rate gets careless when it never experiences adjustments. Adding some spikes in your insulin degrees stops this from happening. This is yet another research that should be taken to the next degree of research.

The most common use of the cyclical ketogenic diet comes from the bodybuilding world.

Why?

Simple, because they would like to know how to build muscle mass, allow muscular tissue definition and strip their body of unwanted water weight before competitors. The feasible anabolic advantage from doing rip off days is very kept in mind from leading body builders and also powerlifters. It’s difficult to say that this does not function. All you have to do is check out them to see that it is working.

The Choice Is Yours!

You might or might not experience lean muscular tissue gains through the ketogenic diet regimen. The excellent information is that weight-loss is quite much assured by the second month. Note that this is weight reduction and also not weight loss as a result of the water weight being shed that was previously gone over. Fat loss could take a couple of even more months prior to any kind of major modifications occur.

Protect your body by obtaining sufficient healthy protein as well as fats throughout the day to make certain that your body has the energy to physically and emotionally perform day-to-day tasks. Carbs are not vital for life, but they do make weight loss a lot easier if you pick to just not consume undesirable ones.

Do you wish to do a fundamental low carbohydrate diet rather?

This is what many diet professionals as well as instructors advise considering that you still have carbohydrates for power and also it permits substantial weight loss to occur. In order to achieve this, you must take the quantity of everyday calories your body calls for and also split it in half.

This ensures that you consume less carbohydrates than you make use of. It prevents ketosis as well.

Drink lots of water or other beverages without any added sugar. These will maintain your body hydrated. Certainly, you might wish to consult with your physician prior to making large modifications to your diet or if you have had any kind of previous health and wellness conditions.

Conclusion

The ketogenic diet plan is not for everybody. It can be very hard to follow. Worse yet, it will take a while for real fat loss to happen. But, it could work. If you intend to use it, consider including rip off days.

Of training course, you’ll likewise wish to get enough protein, vitamins, minerals and fiber throughout the week. It’s challenging, however nothing in life ever is!

- By Brian Pankau, CPT

But, the concern most would certainly have is that they will certainly have to discover more food sources that have the vitamins as well as minerals as well as fiber being lost by not eating carbs.

Multi-vitamins are a great means to perhaps stop nutrient shortages. Protein abundant foods usually have dietary fats as well. In various other words, consuming a great deal of foods high in protein will keep most of your diet regimen filled up.

You desire ones that have no cholesterol or trans fat. Keep in mind additionally that fruits as well as veggies are carbs, so if you remove all carbohydrates you are not able to consume these.

Your fridge should be loaded with high healthy protein foods such as poultry, turkey, fish, pork as well as beef. Tofu is a healthy choice as well. Research shows that saturated fats could not exactly be the wrongdoer triggering heart illness as well as high cholesterol on its very own. The research study showed that saturated fats only caused greater cholesterol levels when mixed with high levels of carbohydrates.

But eaten by itself without any carbs it showed no changes. More research study will certainly come to see why this happens.

This Is The Intermittent Ketogenic Diet

This is an advanced variation because you are eating carbs for details changes in your anabolic levels. You allow this to naturally happen by following exactly what is called rip off days. A rip off day implies you can pack your body up with carbohydrates only on that details day. You might do this once a week or when every various other week.

Research shows that rip off days are effective for permitting a lot more weight loss to take place as well as activating muscle-building hormones. The factor behind this theory is that your metabolic rate gets careless when it never experiences adjustments. Adding some spikes in your insulin degrees stops this from happening. This is yet another research that should be taken to the next degree of research.

The most common use of the cyclical ketogenic diet comes from the bodybuilding world.

Why?

Simple, because they would like to know how to build muscle mass, allow muscular tissue definition and strip their body of unwanted water weight before competitors. The feasible anabolic advantage from doing rip off days is very kept in mind from leading body builders and also powerlifters. It’s difficult to say that this does not function. All you have to do is check out them to see that it is working.

The Choice Is Yours!

You might or might not experience lean muscular tissue gains through the ketogenic diet regimen. The excellent information is that weight-loss is quite much assured by the second month. Note that this is weight reduction and also not weight loss as a result of the water weight being shed that was previously gone over. Fat loss could take a couple of even more months prior to any kind of major modifications occur.

Protect your body by obtaining sufficient healthy protein as well as fats throughout the day to make certain that your body has the energy to physically and emotionally perform day-to-day tasks. Carbs are not vital for life, but they do make weight loss a lot easier if you pick to just not consume undesirable ones.

Do you wish to do a fundamental low carbohydrate diet rather?

This is what many diet professionals as well as instructors advise considering that you still have carbohydrates for power and also it permits substantial weight loss to occur. In order to achieve this, you must take the quantity of everyday calories your body calls for and also split it in half.

This ensures that you consume less carbohydrates than you make use of. It prevents ketosis as well.

Drink lots of water or other beverages without any added sugar. These will maintain your body hydrated. Certainly, you might wish to consult with your physician prior to making large modifications to your diet or if you have had any kind of previous health and wellness conditions.

Conclusion

The ketogenic diet plan is not for everybody. It can be very hard to follow. Worse yet, it will take a while for real fat loss to happen. But, it could work. If you intend to use it, consider including rip off days.

Of training course, you’ll likewise wish to get enough protein, vitamins, minerals and fiber throughout the week. It’s challenging, however nothing in life ever is!

- By Brian Pankau, CPT

trail.content_raw:
Ketogenic diet what? Here’s every little thing you need to find out about the diet plan that virtually every fit individual is trying and also the best ways to do it right.

Full body changes are rather popular now, and also the health and fitness industry is booming as well as making bigger revenues than ever before before.

These funds are being utilized to support research. One kind of diet that has actually ended up being one of the most researched and followed is the ketogenic diet.

The best supplements also base their active ingredients off of this diet to try and market a product that boosts the oncoming effects from ketosis. 

But, there are still concerns concerning it. Will the ketogenic diet regimen genuinely help you boost lean muscle mass growth?

Is it just a craze diet that will leave us in the near future?

Let’s have a look at the facts surrounding the ketogenic diet.

What Is The Ketogenic Diet?

The ketogenic diet plan is a scientific term utilized to indicate a really low carb diet. You’ll need good knowledge of how your body reacts to particular changes. A shift in your metabolic rate for power manufacturing is a very large offer. People are constantly searching for how to speed up your metabolism. 

The ketogenic diet basically means you consume less carbs compared to normal. For the majority of individuals, this triggers a metabolic switch to naturally happen within one to 7 days.

A metabolic button is when you alter the way your body uses nutrients to produce energy. Energy for many people is gained through glycogen.

This is the stored kind of sugar located throughout your liver, muscular tissues as well as body fat. Glucose is sugar that comes from carbs received in the foods you eat. There are many ways how to measure body fat. 

Since a ketogenic diet restricts the amount of carbohydrates being taken in, your body goes into a metabolic button from utilizing carbohydrates for power to fats instead. When fats are being utilized for energy manufacturing they remain in the kind of acids called ketones.

This is the reason that it is referred to as the ketogenic diet.

This Is The Purpose Of The Ketogenic Diet

Why would put on your own via such a diet? The primary reason this sort of diet began being used was for overweight patients. People who commonly deal with excessive weight usually have an addiction to carbs. This dependency suggests a whole lot of sugar is being consumed. Your body utilizes carbohydrates swiftly for energy to do day-to-day or training based tasks. The problem with this is that your body just requires sufficient to remain active.

Excess carbs end up being stored as harmful body fat.

Limiting the quantity of carbs creates these obese people to no more shop carbohydrates. Instead, they start to utilize their very own body fat to provide power. This drastically causes weight-loss within the very first 2 or three months. But, most of the weight being lost is water weight as carbs are water dense. True weight loss begins hereafter timeframe.

The main reason a great deal of people do the ketogenic diet plan now is how to gain muscle mass but stay lean through the decrease of body fat. The common person following this diet is not overweight, yet does have some excess body fat.

A lot of bodybuilders love this diet regimen for temporary use. It assists them to decrease body fat web content quickly for competition purposes.

Following The Ketogenic Diet plan Usually Ends In Failure

In the right-hand men, this diet regimen has lots of potential advantages. Sadly, the ordinary person adhering to a ketogenic diet regimen will certainly fall short. The major factor is due to the fact that culture has expanded to enjoy carbs.

The biggest section for most dishes is carbohydrates rather of protein. As well as, the kinds of foods we often crave feature carbs. In completion, many people shed their self-control and offer right into their cravings for sugar to make use of as power. This truly is an addiction.

Studies show that the short-term advantages of the ketogenic diet remain in fact lean muscle development and weight loss. That’s when you adhere to the diet regimen together with an appropriate training program.

But, the majority of the team researched returned back to a high carbohydrate consumption after 6 to 8 months of really reduced carbohydrate weight loss.

The just diet that has been confirmed effective past the six-month duration is the Mediterranean diet. The benefits of this diet plan include prevention against cardiovascular disease as well as various other heart associated conditions.

So What Does This Mean For You and also The Ketogenic Diet?

You need lots of willpower as well as the capacity to diet plan with proper food sources to stay healthy. You also need to set short term objectives that concentrate on around one to 6 months of ketogenic dieting.

Some individuals hold true designs for the ketogenic diet plan being used for longer durations.

They have not a problem with it. Sadly, they make up a tiny percent. Consider it like those who smoke and live healthy and balanced lives past the age of 90. It can be done.

But, many cigarette smokers will certainly establish wellness concerns long prior to they reach this age.

There Are Possible Adverse Negative effects to The Ketogenic Diet …

All extreme diet regimens have some feasible side effects to be aware of. The ketogenic diet is no different. Other diet regimens such as a low healthy protein or low-fat calorie limitation take a bit longer to reveal their side effects.

If you get on the ketogenic diet plan, any kind of possible side results will start to reveal much quicker.

Some state the ketogenic diet regimen adverse effects generally begin within a week. In fact, it could be sooner. Some notification it around the 3 or four-day mark.

What Are The Many Typical Negative effects of an Extremely Reduced Carbohydrate Diet?

They include tiredness, power loss, regular headaches, dehydration, loss of psychological focus as well as possible muscle loss.

How long can these adverse effects last?

It depends upon the person complying with the diet regimen. As discussed, a tiny number of individuals will have the ability to undergo exactly what is recognized as a keto-adaptation. This is when your body is capable of using ketones for energy manufacturing, and the negative effects never ever happen.

There is a true display of self-discipline when it pertains to combating past these adverse effects.

This is why most just comply with a severe diet regimen of this nature for brief durations to reduce fat and also permit lean muscle development. Most do not intend to adopt this kind of dieting as a lifestyle choice.

Regarding how to get lean, the science isn’t clear. Some studies reveal the muscles will undergo assimilation, which is when a molecule is exchanged energy.

The absence of carbs to be used for power creates your body to not only utilize ketones, but muscles as well.

Other research studies mention that lean muscle mass will be kept if the person consumes adequate protein as well as nutritional fats. Either way you are taking threats with your body when it pertains to following a ketogenic diet plan for a lengthy time.

This Is Ways to Appropriately Allow Ketosis

Still seeking to obtain the most effective feasible take advantage of a ketogenic diet regimen?

The procedure is not hard to finish regarding beginning the metabolic switch. But, you do have to have a restrictive diet regimen plan that concentrates on nutrients with treatment. The way you consume nutrients may differ depending on how intense you desire the ketosis impact to be.

Some people eat up to 200 calories of carbohydrates every day to attempt to offset the fatigue as well as other side effects. Others totally strip their diet of all carbs. People say that this could create ultimate fatality.

But the Food and also Nourishment Board of the Institute of Medicine says otherwise. They mentioned that no carbohydrates are had to sustain life.

Keep in mind that carbohydrates have actually never ever been recognized as being crucial. In various other words, no person has actually said you require carbohydrates to live. Generally the claims are that a ketogenic diet regimen is entirely alright to follow as a way of living selection. There are no easy diets.

But, the concern most would certainly have is that they will certainly have to discover more food sources that have the vitamins as well as minerals as well as fiber being lost by not eating carbs.

But eaten by itself without any carbs it showed no changes. More research study will certainly come to see why this happens.

This is yet another research that should be taken to the next degree of research.

Why?

Simple, because they would like to know how to build muscle mass, allow muscular tissue definition and strip their body of unwanted water weight before competitors. The feasible anabolic advantage from doing rip off days is very kept in mind from leading body builders and also powerlifters. It’s difficult to say that this does not function. All you have to do is check out them to see that it is working.

The Choice Is Yours!

You might or might not experience lean muscular tissue gains through the ketogenic diet regimen. The excellent information is that weight-loss is quite much assured by the second month. Note that this is weight reduction and also not weight loss as a result of the water weight being shed that was previously gone over. Fat loss could take a couple of even more months prior to any kind of major modifications occur.

Protect your body by obtaining sufficient healthy protein as well as fats throughout the day to make certain that your body has the energy to physically and emotionally perform day-to-day tasks. Carbs are not vital for life, but they do make weight loss a lot easier if you pick to just not consume undesirable ones.

This is what many diet professionals as well as instructors advise considering that you still have carbohydrates for power and also it permits substantial weight loss to occur. In order to achieve this, you must take the quantity of everyday calories your body calls for and also split it in half.

This ensures that you consume less carbohydrates than you make use of. It prevents ketosis as well.

Drink lots of water or other beverages without any added sugar. These will maintain your body hydrated. Certainly, you might wish to consult with your physician prior to making large modifications to your diet or if you have had any kind of previous health and wellness conditions.

Conclusion

The ketogenic diet plan is not for everybody. It can be very hard to follow. Worse yet, it will take a while for real fat loss to happen. But, it could work. If you intend to use it, consider including rip off days.

Of training course, you’ll likewise wish to get enough protein, vitamins, minerals and fiber throughout the week. It’s challenging, however nothing in life ever is!

description:
The Week 7 edition of college football picks against the spread is highlighted by a key SEC East vs. West showdown as Georgia makes a rare trip to Baton Rouge to face LSU. Elsewhere, red-hot Notre Dame hosts Pittsburgh, Miami heads to Virginia for a tougher-than-expected battle with the Cavs and Memphis hosts UCF in a clash of AAC heavyweights. Here are 10 predictions for games against the spread.

Here are 10 predictions for games against the spread.

summary:
It’s 6:13 AM and I’m done with my workout. 
5 mins bike at level 7 (1.39 mi) 
15 soldier walks (x2)
15 butt kicks (x2) 
10...
body:
It’s 6:13 AM and I’m done with my workout.


5 mins bike at level 7 (1.39 mi)

15 soldier walks (x2)

15 butt kicks (x2)

10 piriformis walks (x2)

3 inchworms (modified)

30 shoulder mobility exercises


2 sets 15 TRX push-ups

2 sets 5 lbs floor flys (15 reps then second 10 reps)

2 sets TRX rows

2 sets 15 40 lbs lat pull down

2 sets 15 30 lbs pallof press

2 sets 15 20 lbs - 10 lbs squat —> overhead press

2 sets 15 glute bridges


Stretching

Sauna

Death. Lol.
